full_summary:
### Tender Notice for Logging Trailer with Boom Grapple and Hydraulic Pack

#### Solicitation Number
W8476-246836/A

#### Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) invites suppliers to submit proposals for the procurement of a Logging Trailer with Boom Grapple and Hydraulic Pack with the following specifications:
- Minimum load capacity: 7,000 kg
- Minimum load length: 3,600 mm
- Minimum capacity: 3,600 mm
- Delivery to CFB Borden, ON
- Requested delivery date: 180 days after receipt of order
- GSIN: N2330

#### Tender Documents
The following documents are available for download:
- [Amendment 003](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30910/en-rfp-w8476-246836-amendment-003_0.pdf)
- [Amendment 002](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30910/en-rfp-w8476-246836-amendment-001.pdf)
- [Amendment 001](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30910/en-rfp-w8476-246836-amendment-002.pdf)
- [Original Solicitation](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30910/eng-w8476-246836--a-original.pdf)

#### Submissions
Bids must be submitted electronically via email to:
DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca

#### Important Details
- This tender uses electronic receipt of bids only
- Suppliers are responsible for ensuring their bid submissions are received by the deadline
- The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement
- Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada

#### Selection Criteria
- The lowest-priced bid will be selected

#### Trade Agreements
- This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### End of Tender Notice

[Date of Last Update: 2024-03-15] [Crown Copyright Reserved] [Bidding Deadline: 2024-03-15T14:00:00] [Department of National Defence Headquarters Contracting Authority]
